message: This is my first offer. I'm trying to be fair, but I know I'll get more with each passing round. Let me know if you'd like to negotiate.
I'm willing to split the money more evenly. Let's see if we can make this work.

I'm willing to move a bit closer to your last offer, but I'm still aiming for a larger share. If we can't come to an agreement soon, the value of the money will drop even further for both of us. Let's talk.
